Package Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player including the players stats (SPECIAL, HP) and state (actions).

  • Field Details

    • specials

      private Special specials
      Represents the players base special stats. Each stat cannot have a value lower than 1 or higher than 15. Boosts to these stats are handled through SpecialBonusCalculationService.

    • level

      private int level

    • maxHP

      private double maxHP

    • currentHP

      private double currentHP

    • isAiming

      private boolean isAiming

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player()
      The constructor for a Player object.

  • Method Details

    • setMaxHP

      public void setMaxHP()
      Sets the maximum health points a player can have. This is calculated as 245 + 5 * Endurance.

    • setCurrentHP

      public void setCurrentHP(double hp)
      Sets the current health points a player has. This cannot be higher than the maximum HP.

    • getHealthPercentage

      public double getHealthPercentage()
      Gets the percentage of health remaining. Useful for mutations such as Adrenal Reaction or effects such as Bloodied.
      Returns:
      Double healthPercentage.
